title: Rate limit login attempts
problem: Brute-force attempts can hammer the single admin login and degrade availability.
done_when: Add IP-based + username-based rate limiting with sane defaults and clear error messaging.

title: CSRF protection for admin actions
problem: Cookie-based auth without explicit CSRF protection can be abused in some scenarios.
done_when: Add CSRF token (or double-submit) for all state-changing endpoints; verify with e2e smoke.

title: Session management page improvements
problem: Users can’t easily see active sessions, IP history, or revoke all sessions quickly.
done_when: Add revoke-all button, last-seen/IP table polish, and clear current-session badge.

title: Add configurable password policy
problem: Admin password may be weak; no guidance or enforcement exists.
done_when: Add server-side min length + common-password reject (configurable) and UI hints.

title: Expose security headers config
problem: CSP/HSTS and other headers are partially hard-coded; deployments want control.
done_when: Add documented env vars for CSP/HSTS/Referrer-Policy presets and render current values in Panel.

title: Global quick switch (daemon + instance)
problem: Switching daemon/instance requires multiple clicks and loses context.
done_when: Add a unified quick switch (Cmd+K) entry for daemon + instance with fuzzy search.

title: Pin/favorite nodes
problem: Users with many nodes need faster access to frequent ones.
done_when: Add per-user pinned nodes (localStorage) and show them first in Nodes + daemon selector.

title: Recent activity feed
problem: Users want to see what happened recently across nodes/games.
done_when: Add an activity feed aggregating toasts/audit items with filters and copy/export.

title: Improve empty states for offline daemon
problem: When daemon is offline, pages show disabled controls with little guidance.
done_when: Show contextual offline empty states with “Troubleshoot” links and recommended checks.

title: Better inline help for env vars
problem: Users struggle to map env vars to UI behavior (compose/local).
done_when: Add inline help tooltips linking to docs sections for common env vars.

title: Responsive topbar layout for narrow screens
problem: Topbar can overflow on mobile; important controls become hard to reach.
done_when: Add a compact topbar mode with overflow menu and adaptive daemon selector.

title: Add compact table density option
problem: Tables/cards still feel tall even in compact density.
done_when: Extend density tokens to table rows and card headers; validate touch targets.

title: Consistent icon-only button sizing
problem: Some icon-only buttons differ in padding/size across views.
done_when: Audit all iconOnly buttons and normalize to token-based sizes.

title: Improve modal stack handling
problem: Multiple modals/drawers can conflict, causing scroll lock or focus issues.
done_when: Introduce a single modal manager with z-index stack and focus restoration.

title: Better typography for long code blocks
problem: Large code blocks (compose/log snippets) are hard to scan.
done_when: Add optional line numbers + better wrapping toggle + copy affordance.

title: Diff viewer for file edits
problem: Users can’t review changes before saving; mistakes are common.
done_when: Add a side-by-side/inline diff for text files before save; preserve CRLF.

title: File upload progress per file
problem: Multi-upload lacks per-file progress and failure visibility.
done_when: Show per-file progress bars, retry failed files, and summary toast.

title: Zip preview before extract
problem: Extracting unknown zip content is risky and can spam directories.
done_when: Show zip file tree preview with size totals and selectable extract targets.

title: Better binary previews (audio/video)
problem: Some binary files would benefit from preview instead of download-only.
done_when: Add safe previews for common media types with size caps.

title: Breadcrumb overflow handling
problem: Deep paths overflow and reduce usability on small screens.
done_when: Add truncation with hover tooltip and a copy-path button always visible.

title: Instance health summary card
problem: Users want a single glance summary: status, port, players, TPS, RAM.
done_when: Add a sticky summary card with key metrics and quick actions.

title: Player list improvements
problem: Player list lacks sorting, last-seen context, and copy actions.
done_when: Add sort by name/lastSeen, copy UUID, and quick ban/whitelist shortcuts.

title: One-click world download
problem: Sharing world for debugging requires manual file navigation.
done_when: Add a “Download world” action that zips the world folder safely.

title: Backup retention policies UI
problem: Backups can grow unbounded; retention policies are hidden or manual.
done_when: Add per-instance retention rules and a preview of deletions.

title: Server.properties advanced editor mode
problem: Current editor handles common fields only; advanced users need full control.
done_when: Add an advanced raw editor with diff + validation warnings.

title: Log search across history
problem: Users can only search current buffer; older logs require downloads.
done_when: Add server-side log file search (latest + rotated) with limits and highlighting.

title: Structured log filters
problem: Keyword search is noisy; users want level/module filters.
done_when: Add level filters + regex presets for common MC errors/warnings.

title: Export selected log range
problem: Sharing logs often needs a small slice, not full file.
done_when: Add selection + export to text with timestamp context and copy/download.

title: Improve log rendering performance
problem: Very long lines and heavy highlights can cause jank.
done_when: Optimize highlight pipeline and cap work per frame.

title: Log bookmarks
problem: Users revisit the same error lines repeatedly.
done_when: Add per-instance local bookmarks with labels and quick jump.

title: FRP proxy list UI improvements
problem: Proxy list is technical and lacks statuses per instance.
done_when: Add per-proxy status chips, restart buttons, and last error display.

title: FRP diagnostics panel
problem: FRP issues are hard to debug without logs/config view.
done_when: Add diagnostics: show generated config, frpc logs tail, and connectivity tests.

title: Validate FRP remote port conflicts
problem: Users accidentally reuse remote ports causing failures.
done_when: Add validation against known used ports and warn before start.

title: FRP profile tags
problem: Many profiles become hard to distinguish.
done_when: Add tags/notes for FRP profiles and filter/search.

title: Better latency visualization
problem: Single latency number is not enough to understand stability.
done_when: Add mini sparkline latency history and jitter display.

title: Improve chart accessibility
problem: Charts are visual-only; screen readers get little value.
done_when: Add aria descriptions, data tables fallback, and keyboard focus for points.

title: Reduce motion toggle
problem: Users with motion sensitivity need a UI toggle beyond OS settings.
done_when: Add a preference to disable animations regardless of OS setting.

title: High contrast theme audit in tables
problem: Some table borders/status colors may fail contrast in contrast theme.
done_when: Adjust tokens and verify key surfaces meet contrast targets.

title: Better focus management in drawers
problem: Focus can land behind overlays; ESC behavior varies.
done_when: Ensure focus trap + restore, consistent ESC close, and skip link works in overlays.

title: ARIA labels for dynamic buttons
problem: Some dynamic icon buttons lack descriptive labels for context.
done_when: Add contextual aria-labels (include instance/node ids) for key actions.

title: Reduce unnecessary rerenders
problem: Large page.tsx context causes wide rerenders on small state updates.
done_when: Split context into smaller providers or memoized selectors; verify FPS.

title: Client-side caching strategy
problem: Repeated switching tabs refetches and causes flicker.
done_when: Add SWR-like cache with TTL and stale-while-revalidate for key endpoints.

title: Defer heavy components on load
problem: Initial render loads many components, increasing TTI.
done_when: Lazy-load non-critical modals and charts; keep core nav fast.

title: Optimize large lists virtualization
problem: Nodes/games/files can grow; list rendering may slow down.
done_when: Add virtualization for long lists with stable heights and keyboard support.

title: Bundle size audit
problem: Next build output may include unused code paths.
done_when: Audit bundle analyzer and reduce dependencies; document results.

title: Add troubleshooting guide for common issues
problem: Users hit recurring issues (WS, ports, permissions) without a single guide.
done_when: Write a Troubleshooting section with symptom→cause→fix steps.

title: Document security hardening checklist
problem: Public Panel deployments need clear hardening steps.
done_when: Add checklist: HTTPS, secure cookies, backups, firewall, tokens rotation.

title: Add architecture diagram
problem: New users struggle to understand Panel/Daemon/FRP relationships.
done_when: Add a simple diagram + data flow notes in README/docs.

title: Add docker-compose validation in CI
problem: Compose changes can break local runs without being noticed.
done_when: Add CI job to run `docker compose config` and fail on errors.

title: Graceful shutdown messaging
problem: Stopping daemon/panel may leave unclear state in UI.
done_when: Add clear UI banner when server is restarting/shutting down and retry logic.

title: Design tokens v2 audit
problem: Color/spacing tokens have grown organically; small inconsistencies cause visual drift.
done_when: Define a minimal token set (color, radius, space, shadow) and update globals/components to use them.

title: Focus ring standardization
problem: Focus styles vary and sometimes disappear on custom buttons/rows.
done_when: Create a consistent focus-visible ring token and apply across interactive components.

title: Button style system refresh
problem: Primary/secondary/danger buttons have subtle inconsistencies in padding, hover, and disabled states.
done_when: Normalize button sizes and states and document variants used in UI.

title: Form field visual consistency
problem: Inputs/selects/textareas do not share consistent height, border, and helper/error spacing.
done_when: Standardize field heights, border colors, and helper/error text layout.

title: Select dropdown polish
problem: Select menus feel mismatched to the rest of the theme and are hard to scan.
done_when: Update Select menu padding, hover state, and selected indicator with theme tokens.

title: Badge and chip redesign
problem: Badges vary in padding and contrast; status chips are not visually consistent.
done_when: Unify badge/chip sizes, colors, and typography across all views.

title: Card header/footer spacing pass
problem: Cards across views have different header/footer spacing and divider usage.
done_when: Create a consistent card header/footer layout pattern and apply it.

title: Toolbar alignment polish
problem: Toolbars across tabs align differently and can look cramped.
done_when: Normalize toolbar spacing, alignment, and wrap behavior for common controls.

title: Tooltip visual redesign
problem: Tooltips are readable but lack consistent max width and spacing in dense areas.
done_when: Update Tooltip styling (max width, padding, arrow, theme) for better readability.

title: Toast visual polish
problem: Toasts can feel noisy and inconsistent in spacing between title/detail.
done_when: Refresh toast layout, spacing, and colors; improve readability on dark/contrast.

title: Empty state template refresh
problem: Empty states differ by view and sometimes lack clear next actions.
done_when: Introduce a shared empty state pattern with title, hint, and primary action slot.

title: Table visual refresh
problem: Tables are functional but look heavy; row hover and header separation can be clearer.
done_when: Tune table borders, hover state, and header styling; keep compact density readable.

title: Icon alignment audit
problem: Icons in buttons/labels do not always align to text baseline and vary in size.
done_when: Audit icons and standardize size/alignment rules across components.

title: Typography scale tuning
problem: Some headings/body text feel inconsistent between cards, modals, and tables.
done_when: Adjust type scale and line heights for a more cohesive hierarchy.

title: Spacing scale tuning
problem: Margins/paddings vary across similar components, causing uneven rhythm.
done_when: Adjust spacing tokens and apply consistently to common layouts.

title: Scrollbar theming
problem: Scroll containers look off in dark/contrast themes and reduce perceived polish.
done_when: Add subtle scrollbar styling for supported browsers and themes.

title: Topbar visual cleanup
problem: Topbar elements can feel crowded; alignment differs across compact/non-compact.
done_when: Normalize heights, vertical alignment, and spacing for topbar controls.

title: Sidebar active indicator redesign
problem: Current active state can be hard to notice, especially in contrast theme.
done_when: Improve active indicator (bar/background) with accessible contrast.

title: Touch target audit
problem: Some icon-only controls are borderline for touch on small screens.
done_when: Ensure minimum touch target size and spacing on mobile/compact layouts.

title: Modal header/footer polish
problem: Modal header/footer spacing and scrolling behavior are inconsistent.
done_when: Make modal headers sticky where needed and standardize footer action layout.

title: Drawer/backdrop polish
problem: Drawers and backdrops can feel abrupt and inconsistent across themes.
done_when: Tune drawer width, shadow, backdrop opacity, and transitions.

title: Danger Zone component restyle
problem: Danger areas are functional but could better communicate risk visually.
done_when: Update Danger Zone styling (icon, border, background) with clearer hierarchy.

title: Code block chrome improvements
problem: Code snippets could be easier to copy/scan with clearer chrome.
done_when: Improve code block header (copy button placement, optional label) and padding.

title: Search input UX polish
problem: Search fields lack a consistent clear affordance and focus treatment.
done_when: Add a clear button and consistent focus styling for search inputs.

title: Notifications list layout polish
problem: Notification center can feel dense; message/detail separation is weak.
done_when: Improve notification item layout, spacing, and detail toggle styling.

title: Banner styles unification
problem: Different banner types (offline/warn/info) lack a shared visual system.
done_when: Create a shared banner component/style variants and apply across the app.

title: Instances list visual unification
problem: Instances appear as cards or rows depending on size; visual language differs.
done_when: Align card and virtualized row styles (active state, actions, meta) for consistency.

title: Games actions layout polish
problem: Primary actions compete visually with secondary actions in Games.
done_when: Refine action grouping, spacing, and button emphasis for clarity.

title: Games metrics chip design
problem: Metrics badges (port/players/TPS/RAM) vary in emphasis and truncation.
done_when: Redesign metrics chips for consistent sizing, alignment, and overflow handling.

title: Install wizard stepper redesign
problem: Install flow is powerful but stepper visuals feel plain and less scannable.
done_when: Improve stepper styling, step labels, and spacing to guide users.

title: Settings modal section styling
problem: Settings content is long; section hierarchy is not strong enough.
done_when: Add section headers/dividers and consistent field grouping in settings modals.

title: Log filters visual polish
problem: Log filters and chips can look cluttered in narrow layouts.
done_when: Refine filter chip styling and wrap behavior; keep keyboard access clear.

title: Socket card typography polish
problem: Address display mixes code and badges; readability can be improved.
done_when: Tweak socket card layout and typography for fast copy and scan.

title: Nodes metric cards polish
problem: Metric grids inside node cards can feel uneven in spacing and typography.
done_when: Align metric card padding, titles, and value sizes for consistency.

title: Nodes list row density tuning
problem: Node list can be dense; key info competes visually.
done_when: Tune row spacing and meta line formatting; ensure pinned/online cues are clear.

title: Node details modal layout polish
problem: Node details modal has many sections; layout can feel heavy.
done_when: Improve section spacing, chart sizing, and table readability in node details.

title: Share view banner styling
problem: Share view should feel clearly read-only and link-friendly.
done_when: Add a distinct share-mode banner style and consistent copy/share cues.

title: File list row visual refresh
problem: File rows can be hard to parse quickly for type/size/time.
done_when: Improve row typography, icon alignment, and hover/selected states.

title: Breadcrumb visual polish
problem: Breadcrumbs work but can look busy with truncation and actions.
done_when: Refine breadcrumb spacing, separators, and focus styles across themes.

title: Diff viewer theme colors
problem: Diff colors can be too strong or weak depending on theme.
done_when: Tune insert/delete colors and contrast for dark/light/contrast themes.

title: Upload dropzone polish
problem: Upload UI works but could better communicate drag/drop states.
done_when: Improve dropzone visuals for idle/hover/active/disabled states.

title: Progress bar visual unification
problem: Progress bars appear in multiple places with slightly different styling.
done_when: Standardize progress bar height, color, and animation; respect reduce-motion.

title: FRP profile card polish
problem: FRP profile cards could better highlight online status and latency.
done_when: Improve card layout, status chip emphasis, and action placement.

title: FRP latency visualization polish
problem: Latency numbers/sparklines need consistent sizing and alignment.
done_when: Tune latency chip/sparkline sizes and spacing for readability.

title: FRP form validation styling
problem: Validation errors in FRP forms are not visually consistent with the rest of UI.
done_when: Use shared field error styles and clearer inline hints.

title: Panel settings layout polish
problem: Settings sections can feel long and visually flat.
done_when: Improve section headers, dividers, and TOC styling for faster navigation.

title: Command palette recent section UI
problem: Recent items are useful but presentation can be improved for scanning.
done_when: Add clear grouping, icons, and keyboard hint styling in cmd palette recents.

title: Keyboard shortcuts modal redesign
problem: Shortcuts list can be hard to scan and inconsistent across locales.
done_when: Group shortcuts, align keys visually, and improve typography.

title: Skeleton loading visual polish
problem: Skeleton loaders vary by view and can feel too aggressive in motion.
done_when: Unify skeleton radius/shimmer and reduce motion when preference is enabled.

title: Transition and motion tuning
problem: Some transitions feel inconsistent and may distract during frequent updates.
done_when: Audit transitions and reduce non-essential animations; keep feedback clear.
